thread.title: Finally, There's an All-Black Highlighter to Match Your Soul
thread.title_full: Finally, There's an All-Black Highlighter to Match Your Soul

author: Brinton Parker
title: Finally, There's an All-Black Highlighter to Match Your Soul
text:
Rituel de Fille Black Highlighter Finally, There's an All-Black Highlighter to Match Your Soul March 13, 2017 A post shared by Rituel de Fille (@ritueldefille) on Mar 4, 2017 at 2:59pm PST 
We're loving this era of dewy, sometimes prismatic highlighters in the beauty world, but let's face it — not everyone is game for unicorn-themed beauty looks. If you're more of a goth fairy princess than the colorful, shimmery type, then you're going to be stoked about this new product from Rituel de Fille: an all-black creme highlighter. The brand's Inner Glow Creme Pigment in Eclipse, hitting shelves in April, is available now on presale for $29 . 
Eclipse can be worn sheer for a subtle, cool-toned eggplant tint on the cheeks, eyelids, or lips, or applied more thickly for a dark, gothic look. The creme formula can also be layered with other cosmetics to lend an intense moody vibe to lipsticks, blushes, or eye shadows. With no hint of sparkle, this product is almost the opposite of what we've come to expect from a highlighter — and we love it. The all-black starry compact that it's encased in is just an added bonus for any "all-black everything" addict's makeup collection. 
Scroll on for a sneak peek of the vampire-vibes packaging and color of Eclipse, and then place your preorder on the Rituel de Fille website !
